results.title: Association of metformin use among diabetics and the incidence of primary open-angle glaucoma - The Chennai Eye Disease Incidence Study
results.text_hl: Studies have reported the usage of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ being associated with the reduced risk of progression of @<m>DISEASE_Glaucoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005901 @@@glaucoma@@@.

results.title: Effect of Diabetes Mellitus and Metformin on Central Corneal Endothelial Cell Density in Eye Bank Eyes.
results.text_hl: Lower ECD was not associated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use except in a subgroup of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Glaucoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005901 @@@glaucoma@@@, in which subgroup analysis showed lower ECD.

results.title: Metformin use associated with protective effects for ocular complications in patients with type 2 diabetes - observational study.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: Our results suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may have a protective effect on @DISEASE_Liver_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008107 @@@ocular complications@@@, especially @<m>DISEASE_Glaucoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005901 @@@glaucoma@@@, in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2D.@@@ The effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ either regarding prevention of @DISEASE_Liver_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008107 @@@ocular complications@@@ or @DISEASE_Liver_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008107 @@@ocular complications@@@ already developed in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2D@@@, should be further investigated.

citations.NLM: Maleškić S, Kusturica J, Gušić E, Rakanović-Todić M, Šečić D, Burnazović-Ristić L, Kulo A. Metformin use associated with protective effects for ocular complications in patients with type 2 diabetes - observational study. Acta Med Acad. 2017 Nov;46(2):116-123. PMID: 29338275
